list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a person or animal) slide unintentionally for a short distance, typically losing one's balance or footing.
go or move quietly or quickly, without attracting notice.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we slipped out by a back door
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi trượt ra khỏi một cửa sau

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: pass or change to a lower, worse, or different condition, typically in a gradual or imperceptible way.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: many people feel standards have slipped
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nhiều người cảm thấy tiêu chuẩn đã trượt

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: escape or get loose from (a means of restraint).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the giant balloon slipped its moorings
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Balloon khổng lồ trượt neo của nó

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of sliding unintentionally for a short distance.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a single slip could send them plummeting down the mountainside
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một phiếu duy nhất có thể khiến họ lao dốc xuống sườn núi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a fall to a lower level or standard.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a continued slip in house prices
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một cú trượt liên tục trong giá nhà

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a woman's loose-fitting, dress- or skirt-length undergarment, suspended by shoulder straps ( full slip ) or by an elasticized waistband ( half slip ).
a slope built leading into water, used for launching and landing boats and ships or for building and repairing them.
a leash which enables a dog to be released quickly.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Tommy bolted off like a greyhound released from the slips
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tommy bắt vít như một con chó săn được giải phóng từ những cú trượt

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: one color at a time should be knitted in striped slip
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một màu tại một thời điểm nên được dệt kim trong trượt sọc

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a small piece of paper, typically a form for writing on or one giving printed information.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: tiền lương hàng tháng của anh ấy

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a cutting taken from a plant for grafting or planting; a scion.
a creamy mixture of clay, water, and typically a pigment, used especially for decorating earthenware.
